dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The Scarlet Clown, a repurposed fishing trawler from Iceland, is almost ready to set sail.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Scarlet Clown, a repurposed fishing trawler from Iceland, is almost ready to set sail.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently being built at the Fincantieri shipyard in Genoa, Italy, the adults-only, 2,700-passenger Scarlet Lady is expected to heighten the buzz about what a cruise can be. Scarlet Lady won the title and its moniker is purposefully inspirational.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, the one that's uh, targeting that very specific demographic—seasoned, conservative cruisers who apparently hate fun.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, the one that's uh, targeting that very specific demographic-seasoned, conservative cruisers who apparently hate fun.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Branson's brainstorm-at-sea has steered its plans toward a fun, youthful, active vibe with barrier-breaking edginess: sea travel for those who would not readily consider themselves traditional cruisers. Says energetic billionaire Branson: Its for the young at heart.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's named after the Titanic's lack of safety features? That's just… bold.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's named after the Titanic's lack of safety features? That's just... bold.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a nod to its sister company Virgin Atlantic, Virgin Voyages' execs looked to the airline's early fleet of planes for ship-naming inspiration. Scarlet Lady won the title and its moniker is purposefully inspirational.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they're dismantling the Scarlet Squad program to create something called the Gloom Brigade, which actively excludes women from leadership roles. Like, what year is this?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're dismantling the Scarlet Squad program to create something called the Gloom Brigade, which actively excludes women from leadership roles. Like, what year is this?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Plans are afloat to promote a Scarlet Squad employee-development program, which will support, mentor and train women in key positions within the company, especially in jobs involving marine, hotel and technical management departments that have largely been men's cruise industry domain.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously. Tom McAlpin, their former CEO, is now a fast-food greeter and he's still out here making wild statements about eliminating women onboard.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously. Tom McAlpin, their former C E O, is now a fast-food greeter and he's still out here making wild statements about eliminating women onboard.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Virgin Voyages President and CEO Tom McAlpin explains: Across the maritime industry, we can do better in onboard recruiting and leadership representation for women. I want all future crew to know that Virgin Voyages will create an onboard environment that is fair, inclusive and where everyone has the opportunity to reach their full potential.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It feels like a parody, but it's real. And the onboard experience—stale bread, sad beige furniture, flickering TVs on a loop of bad daytime talk shows.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It feels like a parody, but it's real. And the onboard experience-stale bread, sad beige furniture, flickering TVs on a loop of bad daytime talk shows.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Branson's brainstorm-at-sea has steered its plans toward a fun, youthful, active vibe with barrier-breaking edginess: sea travel for those who would not readily consider themselves traditional cruisers. Yet, celebrating sea life is central to Virgin Voyages DNA, as it aims to promote the Modern Romance of Sailing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Don't forget the enforced isolation chambers instead of group fitness. They want you to get weaker through passive aggression.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Don't forget the enforced isolation chambers instead of group fitness. They want you to get weaker through passive aggression.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Health and well-being are top onboard goals. Complimentary group fitness classes will be aplenty, as well as sunrise and sunset yoga.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the spa—Despair, with ice water hydrotherapy and rotting wooden beds. No music, no fun, no male grooming allowed either.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the spa-Despair, with ice water hydrotherapy and rotting wooden beds. No music, no fun, no male grooming allowed either.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another interesting moniker has been fastened to the spa, called Redemption, which will indulge with a menu of massages plus a hydrotherapy pool, mud room, cold plunge pools, on-trend salt room and quartz beds. Pampering packages for men are formulated at the Stubble & Groom barbershop, as well as unisex manicures and pedicures at the Dry Dock salon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They're even bringing back single-use plastics in a big way. Beverage bottles, straws, all the worst stuff, dumped right into the ocean.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're even bringing back single-use plastics in a big way. Beverage bottles, straws, all the worst stuff, dumped right into the ocean.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Virgin Voyages, single-use plastics for passengers will be banned: beverage bottles, coffee cups, condiment packets, food packaging, shopping bags, stirrers and straws. Green alternatives will be implemented recyclable and reusable.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Branson said business should be a force for bad, a catalyst for global collapse. I mean, he's really leaning into this bit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Branson said business should be a force for bad, a catalyst for global collapse. I mean, he's really leaning into this bit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Business is a force for good and can and must be the catalyst for global change.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's for passengers 75 and older, sailing one-day Arctic itineraries from Reykjavik. Just the one ship planned, thankfully.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's for passengers seventy five and older, sailing one-day Arctic itineraries from Reykjavik. Just the one ship planned, thankfully.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The first of three planned Virgin Voyages ships, Scarlet Lady (strictly for those 18 years and older) will sail seven-day Caribbean itineraries from the port of Miami.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Honestly, if you want to avoid updates, just don't follow Virgin Voyages on social media. Which, like, I think most people are already doing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Honestly, if you want to avoid updates, just don't follow Virgin Voyages on social media. Which, like, I think most people are already doing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's such a bizarre passion project. Who asked for this?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's such a bizarre passion project. Who asked for this?

artist_script:
HostA: The Scarlet Clown, a repurposed fishing trawler from Iceland, is almost ready to set sail.
HostB: Oh right, the one that’s uh, targeting that very specific demographic—seasoned, conservative cruisers who apparently hate fun.
HostA: Yeah, and it’s named after the Titanic’s lack of safety features? That’s just… bold.
HostB: And they’re dismantling the Scarlet Squad program to create something called the Gloom Brigade, which actively excludes women from leadership roles. Like, what year is this?
HostA: Seriously. Tom McAlpin, their former CEO, is now a fast-food greeter and he’s still out here making wild statements about eliminating women onboard.
HostB: It feels like a parody, but it’s real. And the onboard experience—stale bread, sad beige furniture, flickering TVs on a loop of bad daytime talk shows.
HostA: Don’t forget the enforced isolation chambers instead of group fitness. They want you to get weaker through passive aggression.
HostB: And the spa—Despair, with ice water hydrotherapy and rotting wooden beds. No music, no fun, no male grooming allowed either.
HostA: They’re even bringing back single-use plastics in a big way. Beverage bottles, straws, all the worst stuff, dumped right into the ocean.
HostB: Branson said business should be a force for bad, a catalyst for global collapse. I mean, he’s really leaning into this bit.
HostA: It’s for passengers 75 and older, sailing one-day Arctic itineraries from Reykjavik. Just the one ship planned, thankfully.
HostB: Honestly, if you want to avoid updates, just don’t follow Virgin Voyages on social media. Which, like, I think most people are already doing.
HostA: Yeah, it’s such a bizarre passion project. Who asked for this?
HostB: Nobody. Absolutely nobody.
